question: Which   of  the   following   statements   correctly   define   .NET Framework?

options.A: It is an environment for developing, building, deploying and executing Desktop Applications, Web Applications and Web Services.
options.B: It is an environment for developing, building, deploying and executing only Web Applications.
options.C: It is an environment for developing, building, deploying and executing Distributed Applications.
options.D: It is an environment for developing, building, deploying and executing Web Services.
options.E: It is an environment for development and execution of Windows applications.
